Desc.entry: An annual fair held in summer (usually the last week in June) at St Mary's Community Centre on Bramall Lane. Stalls represent all aspects of the Green movement including green technology, recycling, waste reduction, campaigning and community action, wildlife protection, education, healthy living, spiritual renewal, alternative and sustainable lifestyles and crafts. Also includes a popular whole food caf√©, licensed bar, live music, displays, debates and talks, children's games and entertainment. Aims to inform the public and encourage them to play a part in greening the city.
